title: Recall animation for "Full Metal Jayce"
body:
Hello! 
I am to get the recall animation for "full metal jayce" updated. I do realize its an old skin. For the price point 10$, 3verything on the skin is good besides the recall. Rito pls update theirs no unique animation to the recall for the money.

replies.body:
Hey friend, I'm happy to see you're willing to provide feedback for Jayce's skin, but you'll want to repost this to the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) where this can be easily tracked and have a higher chance at opening a discussion about this.

Thanks for understanding, please let me know if you have any questions!
